column1: Implementing AI systems improperly can affect human rights.
We can position SAP as a trusted provider of relevant, reliable, and responsible AI.
Compliant and ethical business positively impacts social and economic development, furthering education, justice,
democracy, prosperity, development, and health worldwide. Employees benefit by working for a company seen as
ethical and one that they can trust.
Protection of whistleblowers and assurance of non-retaliation contribute to a greater willingness to speak out
about concerns and thus helps deter corruption and wrongdoing and minimize risks.
Cost savings and legal protection through deep-dive compliance risk assessment for high-risk market units.
Increased cases of non-compliance and potential greater risk to the company.
